Class Matrix4f

java.lang.Object
fr.florian.engine.maths.Matrix4f
public class Matrix4f extends Object
A 4x4 matrix class used for 3D transformations, including translation, rotation, scaling, projection, and view. Stored in row-major order.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final int
    SIZE
    The size of the matrix (4x4).

  • Method Details

    • identity

      public static Matrix4f identity()
      Creates and returns an identity matrix.
      Returns:
      A new identity matrix.

    • translate

      public static Matrix4f translate(Vector3f translate)
      Creates a translation matrix based on the given position vector.
      Parameters:
      translate - The translation vector.
      Returns:
      A matrix representing translation.

    • rotate

      public static Matrix4f rotate(float angle, Vector3f axis)
      Creates a rotation matrix around a given axis.
      Parameters:
      angle - Angle in degrees.
      axis - The axis to rotate around (must be normalized if using non-cardinal axes).
      Returns:
      A rotation matrix.

    • scale

      public static Matrix4f scale(Vector3f scalar)
      Creates a scaling matrix.
      Parameters:
      scalar - Scale values along each axis.
      Returns:
      A scaling matrix.

    • transform

      public static Matrix4f transform(Vector3f position, Vector3f rotation, Vector3f scale)
      Creates a transformation matrix combining translation, rotation (XYZ), and scaling.
      Parameters:
      position - The position vector.
      rotation - The rotation vector (in degrees).
      scale - The scale vector.
      Returns:
      A complete transformation matrix.

    • projection

      public static Matrix4f projection(float fov, float aspect, float near, float far)
      Creates a perspective projection matrix.
      Parameters:
      fov - Field of view in degrees.
      aspect - Aspect ratio (width / height).
      near - Near clipping plane.
      far - Far clipping plane.
      Returns:
      A projection matrix.

    • view

      public static Matrix4f view(Vector3f position, Vector3f rotation)
      Creates a view matrix from a camera position and rotation.
      Parameters:
      position - The camera position.
      rotation - The camera rotation (pitch, yaw, roll).
      Returns:
      A view matrix used for rendering from the camera's perspective.

    • multiply

      public static Matrix4f multiply(Matrix4f matrix, Matrix4f other)
      Multiplies two 4x4 matrices.
      Parameters:
      matrix - The first matrix.
      other - The second matrix.
      Returns:
      The result of matrix multiplication (matrix * other).

      Gets the value at a specific matrix cell.
      Parameters:
      x - Column index (0–3).
      y - Row index (0–3).
      Returns:
      The float value at (x, y).

    • set

      Sets the value at a specific matrix cell.
      Parameters:
      x - Column index (0–3).
      y - Row index (0–3).
      value - The float value to set.

    • getAll

      public float[] getAll()
      Returns the raw matrix data as a flat float array (row-major).
      Returns:
      The internal float array (length 16).
